plot: After visiting a boy with cancer, Lamar realizes that life is short and wants to reconnect with his estranged father Joe. Khloé wants Lamar to make things right with his dad, but also becomes concerned that he'll end up hurt again. Meanwhile, Malika's sister and her family move back to Los Angeles and end up staying at Khloé and Lamar's house while their new place is still under construction. But Khloé quickly realizes that she has overextended herself when they quickly wear out their welcome. Can Khloé learn to put her foot down and say enough is enough?—Guilherme O.
